title: Shitsuji-tachi no Chinmoku
sinopse:
A noble daughter, Kyouka, picked a man long time ago. stubbly beard, but a beautiful man. He became her butler, but he did something that is not supposed to be done to "his princess"...

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Included one-shots:
Volume 2: Kuroneko Lily
Volume 3: Tarou-kun wa Yuganderu
Volume 4: Amai Wana to Nigai Mitsu
Volume 9: Hakoniwa Fuufu
Volume 11: Hakoniwa Oyako
